item.title: Report I-2025010084
item.description:
Report I-2025010084

Identified by scraper @ 2025-02-01T00:52:02+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-12-23
  • City: Morton
  • State: MS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: SOUTHEASTERN FREIGHT LINES, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Recieved call at 14:10 on 12/23/2025 about a leak coming out of trailer# 287406 at a rest area in Morton MS. Not sure if it was a Hazmat shippment i drove out to location to check, once determined what was leaking Hazmat One was called at 15:54. Leak seemed to be a pin hole or a crack in the seam. Hazmat one arrived and while attempting to place drum in an over-pack the drum was dropped on the comer of another pallet creating a large gash and about 20 gal. was then released. All was cleaned up and 4 drums of debris was created plus the over-pack.
